name: Procedural Platformer Project
description:
The Procedural Platformer Project is a procedural platforming game created for the 2017 ProcJam!

The terrain of each of the games 12 stages are created procedurally each time you play!

Controls:
A/D keys  = Move left or right
Left/Right Arrow Keys = Move left or right
left mouse Button = jump (to attack enemies)
Esc = pause game

collect crystals, they keep you alive!
Jump on enemies to defeat them!

This game is inspired by Cuphead & Sonic Mania!
